String.string: In order to enter an Ace dungeon, you need to select at least one task and should be level 65.
Get hit by BAMs as little as possible while clearing the dungeon.
Kill the boss and clear the dungeon as fast as possible.
Reach as large of a combo as possible while clearing the dungeon.
Let the system choose a random task. On completing the task, you get {randomBonusRate}% more ace medals.

S+ Level: 0–4 hits
S Level: 5–29 hits
A Level: 30–79 hits
B Level: 80–199 hits
C Level: 200 hits

S+ Level: 0 – 2 min. 59 sec.
S Level: 3 min. – 3 min. 29 sec.
A Level: 3 min. 30 sec. – 4 min. 29 sec.
B Level: 4 min. 30 sec. – 5 min. 29 sec.
C Level: more than 5 min. 30 sec.

S+ Level: 150 combo or more
S Level: 100 combo or more
A Level: 50 combo or more
B Level: 20 combo or more
C Level: lower than 19 combo
Monster buffs get stronger as you progress. Clearing the dungeon finishes the task.
Reaching maximum combo numbers is not enough. You must still clear the dungeon to get the rewards.
